Headline: Purple Line Express Delays
ShortDescription: Purple Line Express trains are running with residual delays following an earlier signal problem near Wilson.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line Express trains are running with residual delays following an earlier signal problem near Wilson. 

Shuttle bus are available from Howard to Belmont to provide service into the Loop until 7:00 am.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
